person.bio: Mahmoud is a passionate Computer Scientist who loves exploring new areas in life and technology. Software Engineer fell in love with Threefold because threefold is the future of technology.
person.excerpt: Mahmoud is a passionate Computer Scientist who loves exploring new areas in life and technology.
